definition[0]: to waste time behaving in a silly way or doing things that are not important
example[0]: He always used to fool around in class.
definition[1]: to behave in a way which is careless and not responsible
example[1]: Some idiot’s been fooling around with the electricity supply!
definition[2]: to spend time doing something that you enjoy, but that does not have a particular purpose
example[2]: The boys were out in the yard, just fooling around.
definition[3]: to have a sexual relationship with someone else’s wife, boyfriend etc
example[3]: She found out that he’d been fooling around behind her back.
